amendment.description: To establish the West Coast Groundfish Fishing Capacity Reduction Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 46 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 46 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S1406-1408; text: CR S1406) To establish the West Coast Groundfish Fishing Capacity Reduction Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 46 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 46 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Wyden.
